column5: we must have hit a wrong button on the remote, now we can only watch and search HD channels and can't get out of it, help please, thanks
shut it off, then turn it back on just looked at my remote, and cant see anything that would put it into that mode
thanks, I tried that and surprisingly it stayed in the same mode
Take the batteries out of the remaote??
my wife figured it out, she doesn't know how she did it(search button?) but got it done, thanks guys
Who muffed it up, you or the wife

I know it's fix now but this might help in the future:  With our expressvu remote if you press the guide button after you are in the guide mode it will cycle through different channel options, such as "all channels", "all subscribed channels", "all HD" and then any favourite channel subsets.
Life used to be so simple when we only had 4 channels and you changed them by turning  a little dial on the front of the TV set
You are exactly right Kickingfrog.... I've had expressview a long time and that is easily done.
